attributes.action: Allow 19/20 batch overseas students to apply Graduate route visa before 1st July
attributes.additional_details: As students came in Jan 20 and 1st lockdown were introduce in 23rd March 20, since June 1st still we are in national lockdown, students who wants to have experience in relevant field was counting on Graduate route but government launched this visa in July 2021, some have less then 15 days to become eligible for PSW, We respect UK education system and Home Office and Urge on behalf of Overseas students to consider reviewing eligibility for Jan 2020 students. NISAU UK & UKCISA also requested this.
attributes.background: Overseas students who came in Jan 20 for 1 years masters  & graduating before summer 2021 faced extreme disruption academically & professionally more losing work offers and are in lot of stress. Since 1st lockdown businesses were closed and 19/20 students faced more hardships then Sep 20 batch.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend the 2 years post-study work visas to 2020 Graduates: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571665

Extend new Graduate Route to 2020 and pre-July 2021 graduates: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578675
